alert.note: Alert for Jasper; Porter (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Chicago (Northeastern Illinois and Northwestern Indiana)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued October 17 at 4:46AM EDT until October 18 at 1:00AM EDT by NWS Chicago
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 4 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO MIDNIGHT CDT TONIGHT... * WHAT...A period of heavy, wet, wind driven snow is possible. Some areas could see snow accumulations of up to 3 inches, especially away from the lake. * WHERE...Porter and Jasper Counties. * WHEN...From 4 PM this afternoon to midnight CDT tonight. * IMPACTS...Prepare for the possibility of slippery road conditions and hazardous travel, including during evening commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...There is a higher than normal degree of uncertainty with the snow forecast. If snow is less intense than expected or stays east of the area, then little or no snow accumulation would occur.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for Indiana are available by calling 1- 800-261-7623.
